code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Speedometer from'./components/Speedometer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[speed,setSpeed]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const ws=new WebSocket('ws://localhost:8000/ws');ws.onmessage=event=>{const data=JSON.parse(event.data);setSpeed(data.speed);};return()=>ws.close();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:40},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{fontFamily:'Montserrat',color:'#263859'},children:"Live Speed (km/h)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Speedometer,{speed:speed})]});}export default App;
